description: Detection of child processes spawned with SYSTEM privileges by parents with LOCAL SERVICE or NETWORK SERVICE accounts
name: Suspicious Child Process Created as System
query: ((ParentUser:("NT\ AUTHORITY\\NETWORK\ SERVICE" OR "NT\ AUTHORITY\\LOCAL\ SERVICE" OR "AUTORITE\ NT\\") AND user.name:("NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM" OR "AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys") AND IntegrityLevel:"System") AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line:*DavSetCookie*)))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Roberto Rodriguez (@Cyb3rWard0g)
Open Threat Research (OTR)
